title: Mavericks win NBA draft lottery with 1.8% odds
description: The Dallas Mavericks won this year's NBA draft lottery, earning the right to land projected No. 1 pick Cooper Flagg.
author: Michael C. Wright and Jonathan Givony

title: Giannis open to exploring best fits outside Bucks
description: For the first time in his career, Giannis Antetokounmpo is open-minded about exploring whether his best long-term fit is remaining in Milwaukee or playing elsewhere, sources told ESPN.
author: Shams Charania

title: Can Ancelotti fix Brazil and end World Cup hoodoo?
description: Carlo Ancelotti will be in charge for Brazil at the 2026 World Cup. Can he fix their problems before then?

title: 'Box office Blackmore' - pioneer who transformed racing
description: As trailblazing jockey Rachael Blackmore retires from the saddle, we look at her impact and success in jump racing.

title: Which quarterbacks do Jacksonville Jaguars face on 2025 NFL schedule?
description: Which opposing quarterbacks will the Jacksonville Jaguars' defense face on their 2025 NFL schedule?

title: 2025 post-lottery NBA mock draft: Sixers take VJ Edgecombe at No. 3
description: In the first mock draft after the lottery results, the Philadelphia 76ers select VJ Edgecombe with the No. 3 overall pick.

title: IPL to resume on Saturday
description: The Indian Premier League (IPL) will return this Saturday, May 17, after it was suspended last week amid rising tensions between India and Pakistan.

title: Blackmore retires a pioneer who broke new ground
description: Rachael Blackmoreâ€™s professional riding career stretched a little over 10 years. But she bows out leaving few big-race boxes unticked.
